headline: IFF Adds Real-Time Consumer Feedback into Fragrance Creation with Introduction of AI-Powered ScentChat™ App
summary: PARIS, Feb. 4, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- IFF announces the launch of its new AI-powered research tool, ScentChat™, an instant messaging application designed to enhance the fragrance creation process...
